author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the ice, rum, lime juice and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker and shake well to mix. Strain into a Martini glass and garnish with a lime wedge on the rim of the glass.
ingredients: handful ice,  50ml/2fl oz white rum,  35ml/1½fl oz fresh lime juice,  20ml/¾fl oz sugar syrup (often sold as gomme syrup),  lime wedge, to garnish
